query:
SELECT q.id, q.sectionId, q.questionNumber, LEFT(q.questionText, 100) as questionText, LEFT(q.exampleEvidence, 200) as howToEvidence
FROM complianceQuestions q
WHERE q.sectionId BETWEEN 1 AND 10
ORDER BY q.sectionId, q.id
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT q.id, q.sectionId, q.questionNumber, LEFT(q.questionText, 100) as questionText, LEFT(q.exampleEvidence, 200) as howToEvidence
FROM complianceQuestions q
WHERE q.sectionId BETWEEN 1 AND 10
ORDER BY q.sectionId, q.id
LIMIT 5;

rows.questionText: There is evidence that care and support files express individual’s views, choices, and preferences.
rows.howToEvidence: This can be evidenced by providing Care Plan entries showing the person's views, choices, and preferences documented in their own words where possible. Include Pre-admission Assessment, Life History d

rows.questionText: There is evidence that care, and support files have been written with involvement from the person an
rows.howToEvidence: This can be evidenced by Care Plan signature pages showing involvement from the person and/or family, review meeting records with attendees listed.

rows.questionText: The provider has a process in place to ensure that relevant documentation is available upon request
rows.howToEvidence: This can be evidenced by providing your Subject Access Request (SAR) policy, records of SAR requests processed within timescales, and evidence of how records are made available.

rows.questionText: There is evidence that care, and support files are available and accessible to the person and their
rows.howToEvidence: This can be evidenced by showing how care files are stored accessibly (not locked away from person), evidence of people reviewing their own files, and policy on record access.

rows.questionText: There is evidence that care, and support files demonstrate privacy, dignity, and independence. In li
rows.howToEvidence: This can be evidenced by showing Care Plan entries detailing what the person can do independently, goals for maintaining independence, and Daily Notes demonstrating staff encouraged independence rathe
